control.description-key: Fluent UI v2 Navigation Drawer Component for Canvas Apps

data-set.name: navItems
data-set.description-key: Collection of navigation items to display

property-set.name: ItemName
property-set.description-key: Display name for the navigation item

property-set.name: ItemIcon
property-set.description-key: Fluent UI icon name (e.g., Home, Settings, Dashboard)

property-set.name: ItemParentKey
property-set.description-key: Key of the parent item for nested navigation

property.name: DefaultSelectedKey
property.description-key: The key of the initially selected item

property.name: HeaderTitle
property.description-key: Title displayed in the navigation header (e.g., Contoso HR)

property.name: HeaderIcon
property.description-key: Fluent UI icon name for the header (e.g., Person, Home)

property.name: HeaderImageUrl
property.description-key: URL to a custom image/SVG for the header icon (overrides HeaderIcon)

property.name: SelectedKey
property.description-key: The key of the currently selected navigation item

property.name: IsOpen
property.description-key: Whether the navigation drawer is expanded (true) or collapsed (false)

property.name: HeaderSelected
property.description-key: Triggers when the header item is clicked (toggles true/false)
